Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BHT-A1 (natural AMPs; class 2 two-component bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria;  prokaryotes; another chain: BHT-A2)

Literature Information.Literature: A variant of Smb. The amino acid sequence of another chain (BhtA2) is STPACAIGVVGITVAVTGISTACTSRCINK, which is identical to SmbA.  Mutacin BHT-A was active to varying degrees against all of the indicators tested M. luteus, L. lactis, S. mutans 10449 and OMZ175, S. sobrinus B13 and OIHI, especially S. pyogenes strain I7 and S. equisimilis strain I9. Sequence and acitivity updated 3/2017 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Hyink O, Balakrishnan M, Tagg JR.2005
Literature Information.Title: Streptococcus rattus strain BHT produces both a class I two-component lantibiotic and a class II bacteriocin.
